title: Time to Bottom Fish? 3 ‘Strong Buy’ Stocks That Are Down Around 50% This Year - Yahoo Finance
content: Time to Bottom Fish? 3 ‘Strong Buy’ Stocks That Are Down Around 50% This Year  Yahoo Finance
description: What to make of the markets right now? Last week brought more losses in what’s been a volatile year for stocks. The five straight weeks of market declines marked the longest such streak in over a decade. More ominously, they came in along with a number of other disturbing data points. The April jobs numbers, released on Friday, came to 428,000 jobs added for the month, superficially strong and well above the 391,000 expected. But the labor remains depressed, and the total number of workers, even
